description: Single storey detached garden outbuilding (with associated canopy) for use as storage/religious room (Retrospective)
decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be retained in accordance with the following drawings: Elevations and Floor Plans drawing no.EA/AUG/23/C (showing plastic sheeting) and email received confirming nature of use.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning

| The outbuilding shall only be used for domestic purposes incidental to the enjoyment of the dwelling and not for any separate residential, industrial, religious, commercial or business use. No cooking facilities shall be installed at any time.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties, in accordance with the Council's adopted Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) policies 7.4 and 7B, policies 1.1 (g) of the adopted Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and policies D1 and D6 of the London Plan (2021).
